price: 67. Hommes et femmes hypocrites relèvent les uns des autres. Ils prescrivent le condamnable et proscrivent le convenable, et gardent leurs mains fermées par avarice. Ils ont oublié Allah, alors Il les a oubliés. Certes, les hypocrites sont eux les pervers.
arabic: ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقُونَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقَٰتُ بَعۡضُهُم مِّنۢ بَعۡضٖۚ يَأۡمُرُونَ بِٱلۡمُنكَرِ وَيَنۡهَوۡنَ عَنِ ٱلۡمَعۡرُوفِ وَيَقۡبِضُونَ أَيۡدِيَهُمۡۚ نَسُواْ ٱللَّهَ فَنَسِيَهُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: al-munāfiqūna wal-munāfiqātu baʿḍuhum min baʿḍin yamurūna bil-munkari wayanhawna ʿani al-maʿrūfi wayaqbiḍūna aydiyahum nasū al-laha fanasiyahum inna al-munāfiqīna humu al-fāsiqūna
